body:
This PR overhauls the `py-matplotlib` package.

- [x] Add latest version
- [x] Add support for every possible backend
- [x] Simplify how default backend is set
- [x] Switch default backend to `MacOSX` on macOS and `Agg` everywhere else
- [x] Add installation tests

Depends on #12157, #12161, #12163
title: Overhaul matplotlib backend support
